Title: Allows an operator of a motor vehicle to display or provide such operator's certificate of registration in electronic form
Summary: Allows an operator of a motor vehicle to display or provide such operator's certificate of registration to a magistrate, motor vehicle inspector, peace officer, acting pursuant to his or her special duties, or police officer in electronic form.
LawCode: Amd ยง401, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to allowing an operator of a motor vehicle to display or provide such operator's certificate of registration in electronic form
